text: Xinshimen a! Xuduo [youtaijiao de] la bi he [jidujiao de] xiushi que yong zha shu qintun bieren de caichan, bing fang'ai renmen zunxing an la zhidao, yiji naxie [wei bu jiao tian ke] jiaocang jin yin er bu ba ta yong yu an la zhidao zhe, ni dang xiang tamen xuanbu [tamen bi shou] tongku de xingfa.
